mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news (title, summary, content, cover_image, category, tags, source, author, status, is_top, view_count, like_count, create_by, create_time, update_time, publish_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{cover_image}, #{category}, #{tags}, #{source}, #{author}, #{status}, #{is_top}, #{view_count}, #{like_count}, #{create_by}, #{create_time}, #{update_time}, #{publish_time})
mapper.select: SELECT n.*, a.username as creator_name FROM news n LEFT JOIN account a ON n.create_by = a.id WHERE n.id = #{id}
SELECT n.*, a.username as creator_name FROM news n LEFT JOIN account a ON n.create_by = a.id WHERE n.status = 1 AND n.is_top = 1 ORDER BY n.publish_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, content = #{content}, cover_image = #{cover_image}, category = #{category}, tags = #{tags}, source = #{source}, author = #{author}, update_time = #{update_time} WHERE id = #{id}
